text: I had #COVID19 in November. To beat it, I required a dose of Convalescent Plasma. Now, 4 months later, I have no natural protection against COVID, but my @pfizer vaccine is still protecting me. I'm glad I got the #Vaccine. #VaccinateWV #VaccinesSaveLives #vaccinated #VaccinesWork https://t.co/RNsjDN6Nvf
